head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BOCHNAK, ROBERT J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BOCHNAK, ROBERT J.

block.p: BOCHNAK-Robert J. Died suddenly on July 19, 2000. Chairman of the Parks Group, Inc. Former Director of Labor Relations for Pan Am. Survived by wife, children, grandchildren, a mother, and sisters. Reposing Waterbury & Kelly Funeral Home, 45 South Highland Avenue/Route 9, Ossining, NY on Friday, 2-4 and 7-9PM. Funeral Mass St. Augustine Church, Route 9, Ossining, on Saturday at 9:15AM. Interment Ferncliff Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, donations to St. Augustine's Elementary School, Eagle Park/ Route 9, Ossining, NY 10562.
